scripts.generate: prisma generate && mkdir -p ../frontend/src/shared/generated/prisma-client/ && cp -R ./generated/prisma-client/* ../frontend/src/shared/generated/prisma-client/ && mkdir -p ../backend/generated/prisma-client/ && cp -R ./generated/prisma-client/* ../backend/generated/prisma-client/
scripts.seed: npx tsc prisma/seed.ts --outDir temp --module commonjs --target es2020 --lib ES2020 && node temp/seed.js
